summary: As young Sam Gribley runs away he learns about nature.
cast: Ted Eccles|Theodore Bikel|Tudi Wiggins|Paul Hébert|Cosette Lee|Ralph Endersby|George Allan|Dan McIlravey|Frank Perry|Peggi Loder|Tom Harvey|Larry Reynolds|Patrick Peuvion|Gina Dick|Karen Pearson|Ed Persons|Maxie Rosenbloom|Bruno The Bear
title: El muchacho y su montaña
